title: Online Science Education Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with foundational online learning platforms (LMS), secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Program for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to acquire effective online communication strategies in elementary science education settings

learning_goals: Learners can structure scientific arguments using three methods in asynchronous discussion boards and compose discussion posts.
Learners can collect peer feedback via weekly real-time video conferences and implement a process to incorporate it into instructional design.
Learners can produce a 5-minute multimedia content piece explaining scientific concepts using LMS tools (voice recording, screencasting).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
